name: data-card-22
effect: Records the number of times the trainer has come in last across all Pokéathlon events.
short_effect: Records the number of times the trainer has come in last across all Pokéathlon events.

flavor_text.sun_moon: It holds Pokéathlon records. It is a card that shows how many times you have lost a Pokéathlon event.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: It holds Pokéathlon records. It is a card that shows how many times you have lost a Pokéathlon event.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: It holds Pokéathlon records. It is a card that shows how many times you have lost a Pokéathlon event.
